name: [HAVOC] Demo
description:
Arcade fighting game where the stage's destruction is an important part of the experience.

List of controls:

Restart scene = ESC 

Quit game = Alt + F4

Player 1:

Movement = WASD

Jump = Space (Hold to charge)

Attacks = High (W + r), Low (S + r), Medium (r)

Projectile = t (Stuns enemy and leave him open for an attack, for a short amount of time)

Block = y (Blocks only projectiles by pressing the button right before it makes contact with the player)

Taunt = v

Player 2:

Movement = Up key, down key, left key, right key

Jump = . (Hold to charge)

Attacks = High (Up key + p), Low (Down key + p), Medium (p)

Projectile = o (Stuns enemy and leave him open for an attack, for a short amount of time)

Block = i (Block only projectiles by pressing the button right before it makes contact with the player)

Taunt = ,

NOTES: You can't move during an attack animation, projectiles have a cooldown when they hit a player or they are block by the player, shields have a small cooldown too. It doesn't have a life system implemented yet, so the game is currently endless.
